skills.name: Bursting Detonation
skills.desc: Detonates self and deals Wind DMG to a target and its adjacent targets, with a high chance to cause Outrage to the target.

skills.name: Prepare to Fight
skills.desc: Enters the Charge state. Uses Bursting Detonation for the next action.

skills.name: Entomon Eulogy
skills.desc: When receiving a killing blow, deals Wind DMG to all friendly units, with a high chance to slightly increase their DMG received.
